imageAssets.description: A dark, subtly textured game background for a Snake game. Abstract pixel art style with a dark grid pattern overlaying a deep space nebula effect. Overall color scheme: very dark blues, purples, and hints of magenta. Should tile seamlessly or be designed for a 800x600 canvas (native game resolution).
imageAssets.purpose: Main game background, to be drawn on the canvas. Should be visually appealing but not distracting.

imageAssets.description: Pixel art snake head, 32x32 pixels. Bright, vibrant green with two clearly visible white eyes with black pupils. Friendly but focused expression. Designed to look good on a dark background. Facing right.
imageAssets.purpose: Sprite for the snake's head. To be drawn on canvas and rotated based on direction.

imageAssets.description: Pixel art food item: a classic shiny red apple, 32x32 pixels. Simple, iconic, with a small green leaf and a highlight. Clear and distinct.
imageAssets.purpose: Sprite for the standard food item.

imageAssets.description: Pixel art special food item: a glowing, sparkling golden apple, 32x32 pixels. Should appear more valuable and distinct than the regular red apple, possibly with animated sparkle effect hints (static image, but imply sparkle).
imageAssets.purpose: Sprite for a special, high-value food item.
